post_title: [real] motivation
post_body: This is my first post on reddit. Some time ago i wanted to change my life. I wanted to be fit, i wanted to know how to seduce beatiful womens, I wanted to pass exams. But it all was only a words. Real motivation dosen't comes from movies you watched or books you read. Everything is in you and i need 3 years to realize that. This moring i was siting on one of famous people monument and thinking. REAL MOTIVATION COMES FROM YOUR PERSPECTIVE OF LIFE. IF YOU WANT LITERALLY, CHANGE SOME ASPECTS OF YOUR LIFE MOTIVATION WILL COME FROM YOUR FUCKING SOUL, FROM YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS, FROM YOUR _PERSON_. THIS IS HOW IT WORKS. YOU NEED TO THINK ABOUT PLACE YOU ARE RIGHT NOW. YOU DONT _PERSON_ HOW TO BE FIT? ok. YOU DONT _PERSON_ HOW TO _PERSON_ GIRLS? ok. BUT THERE WILL BE A ONE MOMENT IN YOUR LIFE WHEN YOU WILL REALIZE ALL OF THAT  AND IT WILL BE LIKE A HAMMER IN YOUR FACE.  YOUR SOUL WILL CRY BEACUSE YOU WILL NOT LIKE YOURSELF ENOUGH. IN YOUR _PERSON_ WILL EXPLODE A NUKLEAR BOMB. AND AFTER THAT MOTIVATION WILL COME. AND YOU _PERSON_ WHAT? YOU WILL _PERSON_ IN YOUR REFLECTION. LITERALLY EVERYTHING WILL LOOKS LIKE POSSIBLE. YOU WILL CREATE ROAD TO SUCCES WHATEVER YOU WANTS. You want example? There was a time... when i was fat. Not soo fat but i didnt like how i look. I „wanted” to run. And run... No mater how far, now matter how long. It was something like 6 months. I cannot run more then 5 minutes. Few days ago i make test for myself... I was able to run for 20 minutes... then 30 minutes... then 40 minutes. But i broke all chains. I run for 60 minutes first time in my life. I was tired as hell. People was looking at me. But you know what? They _PERSON_ looking at me anymore . There was looking at NEW me i created in tears and sweat. I was feeling like a god. I was my own messiah.Thank you guys for this website. I love you all. This is awesome place. Keep it going. In next few days i will write something more.

I Got trolled by last few days... am playing _PERSON_ 2 when i got 2x gold IV in my team... and oponent teams all platinum.. How it is possible? Am good player... i make at this acc diamond in 2 weeks and now i cant get higher.. almost in all game there is a troll in team, dc, afk, troll WHY... WTF IS GOING ON... Am really sad coz i waste so much time... when i get +10 for win and -25 for LOSE.. WHY _PERSON_ WHY

post_title: Scared of next ban. What can i do?
post_body: Hi guys. I already got a one perm ban. I create another acc. I know i was toxic, i was flaming people etc but i have change. I remember that i got 3 days ban, then 7, then 14 and then 30 days of ban. Am right?Right now i got ban on my acc for 3 days first 2 month ago i think. Today i got banned again for 3 days (little flame, ppl reported me for... hmm... typing too much i would say) What it means? I have changed? My negativity is less then ealier? Beacuse i think i should get 7 days ban instead of 3. Any tips? Advice? Am simply scared. Am trying my best.. am in diamond right now. I will use chat only for game i promise... : PFor exmaple if i will still recive report i will get ban for 7 days right? then 14? 30, and perm ban?

post_title: My conclusion after thinking about suicide in my own room.
post_body: Well, i want to share it with somebody... If i would kill myself in my room... nobody would find me... for few days...my body must would really stink to bothers my mom and make her open the door. We didnt spoke for more then 6 months... again. Got friends, family, passion, and yet am alone. Living in darkness. And yes i know am not "special" there are more ppl like me. I hope the text like this will give you hope.Thanks for every word here.

post_title: Yesterday i turned off cigarette in my hand.
post_body: I was at party. When everyone were having fun... i went to smoke... I don't remember much, but it fucking hurt's, but it's nothing compare to pain inside. Most of things i do... is just for other people. I don't want them to be sad, beacuse of me. I almost never talk about my problems and even i must... am just saying its fine. That am okey.. People think am cool person, confident etc... but they are so fucking wrong.Scar is something real... Am glad that i did that... am just opening my hand and see it... It's not in my head... Am witness of my depression... One of few things that are real... is this scar. Am 21 old male... but i feel like 80... Just wanted to share my thoughts.Thank you.. that you are here.
